itunes:title: Episode 332 - Special Guest Derek Weida and Stacy Weida
title: Episode 332 - Special Guest Derek Weida and Stacy Weida
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Derek and Stacy Weida to discuss the difficulty of conceiving children and how they turned to IVF to make it happen.  This is something that a lot of couples go through, but most men are embarrassed to discus...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Derek and Stacy Weida to discuss the difficulty of conceiving children and how they turned to IVF to make it happen.  This is something that a lot of couples go through, but most men are embarrassed to discuss.  Great episode.
